SEARCH
Package DBLayer

Class AdminDAO

java.lang.Object
DBLayer.AdminDAO
public class AdminDAO extends Object
The AdminDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the database related to administrator operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    AdminDAO()
    Constructs an AdminDAO object.

    Constructs an AdminDAO object with a specified database connection.

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public boolean authenticate(Admin admin, String username, String password)
      Authenticates the administrator based on the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      admin - The Admin object to be authenticated.
      username - The username of the administrator.
      password - The password of the administrator.
      Returns:
      true if authentication was successful, false otherwise.

    • insertManager

      public void insertManager(User manager) throws SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException
      Inserts a new manager user into the database.
      Parameters:
      manager - The User object representing the manager to be inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException - If there is a constraint violation during database insertion.

    • insertSalesAssistant

      public void insertSalesAssistant(User salesAssistant) throws SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException
      Inserts a new sales assistant user into the database.
      Parameters:
      salesAssistant - The User object representing the sales assistant to be inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException - If there is a constraint violation during database insertion.

    • getAllManagers

      public List<User> getAllManagers()
      Retrieves a list of all managers from the database.
      Returns:
      List of User objects representing managers.

    • getAllSalesAssistants

      public List<User> getAllSalesAssistants()
      Retrieves a list of all sales assistants from the database.
      Returns:
      List of User objects representing sales assistants.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(String username, String roleType) throws SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException
      Deletes a user from the database based on the username and role.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be deleted.
      roleType - The role of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException - If there is a violation of integrity constraints.

    • getUserTableName

      public String getUserTableName(String roleType)
      Gets the table name associated with a user role.
      Parameters:
      roleType - The role type of the user.
      Returns:
      The table name associated with the user role type.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an invalid role type is provided.
